title: Digital payments yet to dethrone cash in priority list of Indians during offline purchases: Survey
description: A recent report shows that while digital payments are on the rise in India, cash is still the preferred mode for offline transactions, especially among lower and middle-income groups. The affluent class leads in digital payments, with potential growth expected in small towns.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
